content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal preferences. However, here are some of the top-rated BBQ brisket places in Fort Worth according to Yelp and Tripadvisor.

1. Heim Barbecue & Catering: 1109 W Magnolia Ave, Fort Worth, TX 76104, United States
2. Angelo's Barbecue: 2533 White Settlement Rd, Fort Worth, TX 76107, United States
3. Flores Barbecue: 5012 White Settlement Rd, Fort Worth, TX 76114, United States
4. Cousin's Bar-B-Q: 5125 Bryant Irvin Rd, Fort Worth, TX 76132, United States
5. Smokey's BBQ: 5300 E Lancaster Ave, Fort Worth, TX 76112, United States

It's always a good idea to check the services on their respective websites or social media channels to confirm that they are currently operational and what safety measures they've put in place during COVID-19.
